name: Dark-Blueish Interpals Color Schema V1.2
description:
Basically a darker variation of my ( https://userstyles.org/styles/159020/blueish-interpals-color-schema )... Kinda a work in progress although... I am pleased with it but I suppose its up to you if you like it!

Update V1.2 (2018/05/05) - Minor visual modifications, included more of the site.
Update V1.1 (2018/05/03) - Some minor modifications for visibility and readability.
